pullrequest.title: Ignoring C++ features that are not yet supported by MSVC

content.raw:
As a side note, we [compile the ign-math examples](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/b6a23c64c26f9540c38ba21700210ecd9fb1b2b0/appveyor.yml?fileviewer=file-view-default#appveyor.yml-33:38) in appveyor, and I just made it fail if compiler warnings are detected while compiling the examples. Naturally, it's now got a compiler warning:

~~~
C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\include\xlocale(341):
 warning C4530: C++ exception handler used, but unwind semantics are not enabled.
 Specify /EHsc [C:\projects\ign-math\examples\build\graph_example.vcxproj]
~~~

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/scpeters/ign-math/build/1.0.1166/job/qukqqofcr3g27kp8#L3611

When compiling the ign-math library and tests, it's using `/EHsc`, but the examples aren't getting it. Any thoughts?
